item.title: Colophon
item.description: This site is written and edited in Emacs. But that’s not the whole story… Here’s a list of stuff I use to make this site: Emacs 29.3 Doom emacs Org mode ox-hugo (org → markdown → hugo exporter) hugo (static site generator) git/github/magit (for version control) github.io (for website hosting) Once all those pieces and parts are linked together1, I just write entries in a text file using org mode in Emacs.
